item.caption: DENNIS S KWOK MD - 07/17/2018 3:33 PM PDT
item.paragraph:
Formatting of this note is different from the original.
Chief Complaint:SKIN PROBLEM and NAUSEA
History of Present Illness: 32 Y old male had skin lesion on forehead for one month. It increased in size for 2 weeks. His skin was also flaky and turns red around his forehead and nose. But they are better today. He does not have pain or itch associated with it. He tried over the counter steroid cream and antifungal cream without help.
He has depression. He was off antidepressant for 6 months. He has problem with memory, fatigue and sleeping problem. His appetite is reduced.
Past Medical History:

Plan: EPIDUO 0.1-2.5 % TOP GEL PUMP - apply to affected area in the evening.
recheck if lesion presist in 2 months
